description:
Hello to all Tomb Raider games fans...

asnd this is an surpreendent file for the Tob Raider 1 GOLD - Unfinished Business and why is surpreendent ?

1- the game at the time was maded was 16 bit architectures and even to play in 32 bits or 64 bits the game needed 2 obrigatory things :

- the use of the DosBox emulator to create the 32 or 64 bits environment on a computer with this architectures

2- the absolute need of the game beeing at a virtual drive in order to the dosbox recognize the virtualization of the game to start the game and no cracks working too to meke the virtual drive not necessary

so ... under this couple of circunstances i decide to make research in an Automatic
Drive Virtualization system (ADV) in order to skip the need after instalation to put the game in the correct virtual drive on Daemon Tools or another virtual drives program and i got sucessfully with a fantastic light tool for virtual drives called Imdisk , this tool have only 320k and with the correct console coding works like a real beauty and with a little intelligent management simply do the virtual drive virtualization inserted on the igame installation and this is great for any pc gamer ... specially if you need to specify to a emulator executable the drive that do the virtualization work and like i said the correct console work handle that ...
please donÃ‚Â´t forget to read the RAD ME.txt on the file and i also do a copy-paste of him to this description to complete understand the game installation procedure that is easy to understand ...

ok happy games to all of you and here is the instructions to run the game and because the 32 bits architecture failed the ADV for this game in particular , this game file is only for 64 bits computer architectures, sorry for that but it was what was possible on this case, maybe in the future i found out  away around for 32 bits who knows ?...


INSTRUCTIONS


run TR1Gold-UnfinishedBusiness.exe and
the executable will start the extraction
of TombRaider1Gold executable, in 15 seconds in
fron the light console window will display a cursor
for few seconds then a prompt to install imdisk will
show up and then confirm on yes button in a couple of 
seconds a 2nd  confirm  and the finished setup of imdisk
sucessfully message will be on the screen , just click on
the ok button,in a few seconds is game going in fullscreen 
and when the game is closed the light console window
will still flashing a press any key to continue then just
click return key, this will uninstall the game drive and then
click a second time on the return button to another press
any key to continue from the light console window and this
a prompt to uninstall imdisk will show up, confirm ok wait
a few seconds for the virtual drive installer be removed and the 
light console windows disappears for himself and then it is everything
and with this technical procedure this file is the first that have ADV
method of running that means Automatic Drive Virtualization during
the installation of the game ...
because the game is presented in compressed portable style after the last light
console windows closes up the game file will return to the initial state
with only the compressed portable executable and the arc file on the folder.

NOTE : this game file only work in 64 bits computer architectures
